product_name: Pearl Izumi Fuel Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: A crossover, dual-purpose shoe, the lightweight women's Pearl Izumi Fuel bike shoes boast a running-shoe-style upper and a rubber lugged bottom for efficiency and comfort when cycling or walking.
short_description: A crossover, dual-purpose shoe, the lightweight women's Pearl Izumi Fuel bike shoes boast a running-shoe-style upper and a rubber lugged bottom for efficiency and comfort when cycling or walking.
